abstract: Representative Joe Barton of Texas said on Wednesday that Google had rebuffed requests by his staff for a meeting as part of an investigation into the company’s $3.1 billion acquisition of DoubleClick.
lead_paragraph: Representative Joe Barton of Texas said on Wednesday that Google had rebuffed requests by his staff for a meeting as part of an investigation into the company’s $3.1 billion acquisition of DoubleClick.

headline.main: Congressman Says Google Is Resisting Deal Inquiry
